name: Left Sided Space Ranger
description: On a long mission in space the navigation system on the USSJ stopped working and now they have been stranded in space. Suddenly the radar picks up on multitudes of asteroids coming their way and the ship is put in great peril. After taking a couple hits the thrusters and cannons start malfunctioning. The thrusters are only propelling the ship left and the cannons are only able to shoot left! Will they be able to make it home safe even though their ship does everything to the left.
